mapper.select: select imgUrl, t2.id as familyId, t1.yesterdayOrderNo as orderNo, t2.familyName as name from familyScore t1 right join familyInfo t2 on (t1.familyId=t2.id) where t2.createUserId=#{userId}
select familyId from userFamilyRelation where userId=#{userId} order by id asc
select imgUrl, t2.id as familyId, t1.yesterdayOrderNo as orderNo, t2.familyName as name from familyScore t1 right join familyInfo t2 on (t1.familyId=t2.id) where t2.id=#{familyId}

select imgUrl, t1.familyId as familyId, t3.yesterdayOrderNo as orderNo, t3.beforeYesterdayOrderNo as beforeYesterdayOrderNo, t2.familyName as name, t3.averScore as score from familyDriveDayStat t1 join familyInfo t2 on (t1.familyId=t2.id) join familyScore t3 on (t1.familyId=t3.familyId) order by t3.averScore desc limit 0, 100
select imgUrl, familyName, t2.yesterdayOrderNo as orderNo from familyInfo t1 left join familyScore t2 on (t1.id=t2.familyId) where t1.id=#{familyId}
select record from familyHistory where familyId=#{familyId} order by id desc limit 0, 3

select imgUrl, t1.nickName as name, t1.phone as phone, t1.id as userId, t2.role as role, joinTime from usersAccount t1 join userFamilyRelation t2 on (t1.id=t2.userId) where t2.familyId = #{familyId} order by joinTime asc

select t1.score as score, t2.role as role, t2.daystamp as dayStr from userScoreDayStat t1 join userFamilyRoleLog t2 on (t1.userFamilyScoreId=t2.id) where t1.userId=#{userId} and t2.familyId=#{familyId} order by t2.daystamp desc limit #{start}, 10
select role from userFamilyRoleLog where userId=#{userId} and familyId=#{familyId} and daystamp=#{day}
select role from userFamilyRelation where userId=#{userId} and familyId=#{familyId}
select score, speedingState, driveState, creditState, steadyState, mileageState from userScoreDayStat where userId=#{userId} and daystamp=#{day}

select t1.userId as userId, imgUrl, nickName as name, phone, t3.score as score from userFamilyRelation t1 join usersAccount t2 on (t1.userId=t2.id) left join userScoreDayStat t3 on (t1.userId=t3.userId) where t1.familyId=#{familyId} and t3.daystamp=#{daystamp};
select * from familyDriveDayStat where familyId=#{familyId} and daystamp=#{daystamp}
select time, mileage, startTime, endTime, id as travelId, habitId, userId, createTime from userTravelHistory where userId=71 and endTime>=#{startTime} and endTime<=#{endTime} order by startTime desc
select startTime, endTime from userFamilyRoleLog where userId=#{userId} and familyId=#{familyId} and daystamp=#{daystamp}
select time, mileage, nightDrive, turnTimes, tiredDrive, speedTimes, brakeTimes, maxspeed, overspeedTimes from userTravelHistory where id=#{travelId}
select t1.* from userScoreDayStat t1 join userFamilyRoleLog t2 on (t1.userFamilyScoreId=t2.id) where t1.userId=#{userId} and t1.daystamp=#{day} and t2.familyId=#{familyId}

select orderNo, date_format(str_to_date(daystamp, '%Y-%m-%d'), '%Y/%m/%d') as daystamp from familyDriveDayStat where date_format(str_to_date(daystamp, '%Y-%m-%d'), '%Y-%m')=#{month} and familyId=#{familyId} order by daystamp asc
select nickName, phone, imgUrl, createTime from usersAccount where id=#{id}
select sum(mileage) as totalMileage from userScoreDayStat where userId=#{userId}
select sum(time) as totalTime from userScoreDayStat where userId=#{userId}
mapper.update: update userScoreDayStat set useHoldNum=useHoldNum+1 where userId=#{userId} and daystamp=#{daystamp}
update userScoreDayStat set useZhitiao=useZhitiao+1 where userId=#{userId} and daystamp=#{daystamp}
